body.name: VIZIO 43-inch V-Series 4K LED HDR Smart TV w/Dolby Vision, WiFi 6E, Bluetooth Headphone Capable, AMD FreeSync & Alexa Compatibility, V435M-K04, 2023 Model
features: 4K Picture Perfection - Stream in stunning 4K picture quality. See every detail in enhanced Dolby Vision HDR Bright Mode & HDR10+. Superior contrast and brightness are achieved with Full Array LED Backlight and Active Pixel Tuning - all powered by the IQ Active Processor.

America’s Smart TV - Instantly access millions of titles with America's Smart TV. Stream shows, movies, news, sports, music, and more on all your favorite apps, and enjoy over 250 free channels on WatchFree+.

VIZIO App Catalog - Your VIZIO TV includes an extensive App Catalog where new apps are automatically added and updated – no downloading needed. All the latest apps are instantly available and ready to discover.

Free TV Lives Here - Save on cable bills and stream for free with VIZIO WatchFree+. Built-in to every new VIZIO TV, WatchFree+ gives you 250+ live streaming channels and over 5,000 titles on demand. No subscriptions, logins, or fees.

Powerful Performance - The NEW VIZIO V-Series has the horsepower for powerful performance. Superior picture processing, ultra-quick app navigation and reduced load times are powered by the IQ Active Processor.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 4K Picture Perfection. See every detail in enhanced Dolby Vision HDR Bright Mode & HDR10+. Superior contrast and brightness are achieved with Full Array LED Backlight and Active Pixel Tuning. Minimal Design. Maximum Entertainment. The modern 3-sided ThinFrame design fits beautifully in any room.

Stream it all. Access your favorite apps, cast from your phone, or watch hundreds of free channels. Free TV lives here. No fees, logins or subscriptions required. Hundreds of curated free streaming channels. We work with everyone. Use Alexa, Google Home, and Apple Home for voice control and smart home integration. Stream from your device. Stream it all and more or mirror your screen for presentations and video chats directly on your VIZIO Smart TV.
Previous page Next page 1 Bluetooth Pairing 2 VIZIO Voice 3 VIZIO Mobile
Game on. Game better. Get ready for next-gen gaming with AMD FreeSync, ultra-low input lag, VRR to reduce screen tearing, HDMI 2.1, and newly added Dolby Vision.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This tv is super easy to assemble, and has all the perks to be the best tv for those that video game! Pairs especially well with the new ps5! The picture is very clear and overall a great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great TV for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best tv purchase ever
reviews.reviewText: I have a huge Apple Music and Apple TV fixation. Couple months ago I bought this tv because I wanted a smart tv that would be able to access my Apple channel subscriptions. It works like a dream. I canceled my satellite service and I just use this tv. It saved me enough money that it paid for itself. Such a deal. It was seriously was like getting a free tv after 2 months. So if you don’t need a free high quality tv then this isn’t your thing. But if you’d like to change the way you get tv by all means this is the tv for you. Vizio also has watchfree channels that come as a part of the tv. It also has the ability to sync up your smartphone to it and use your phone for a remote. Which is snazzy but I didn’t see the point unless the actual remote goes missing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars TV works great
reviews.reviewText: TV works great however the remote is slow and terrible. Only plus is being able to download app on phone to use as the remote

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a larger/newer version of this same TV (this one) so I could put my 42 inch in my bedroom and use this great 55 inch in my livingroom...I have an antique English pine cupboard that is fits perfectly in, soooo happy with it, great pic, user friendly and all the streaming apps I use are already installed!!!! Christmas present to myself!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This TV is NOT a TV!!!! WHAT A MESS!!!
reviews.reviewText: This TV is NOT a TV ... It's a streaming device. You cannot expect to turn on this TV, and have it restart on the same channel as when you turned it off. If you have an antenna, and you're watching channel 4, for example, and you turn your TV off and go to bed, when you wake up the next day and turn your TV on, it will not go to the station you left it on when you turned it off. Instead, it will default to the streaming menu as if you want to pick a movie. If you just want to turn your TV on, where you left it last, you CANNOT do that. I have spoken to tech support at Vizio, and they have verified it CANNOT be done. There is a button for what they call, FREE TV+, but that will only take you to a menu of RECENT items. If you're a person who actually likes to watch antenna TV, or switch between games on Sunday, this TV is not for you. By default when you turn it on, it goes to the MOVIE menu. If you want to watch Free TV, You have to hold down the OKAY button, to bring up a display, and then scroll all the way to the bottom of that display and choose ANTENNA. It's like 15 clicks just to get to the stupid ANTENNA TV. There is no way to make it the default. Also, I don't know who designed the interface for this, but it's garbage. The menus do not wrap around. If you get to the bottom of one menu, you would expect if you kept pressing down then it would just wrap around back to the top of the menu ... It doesn't. If you want to get back to the top of that menu, you have to arrow up ALL THE WAY through the menu, instead of it, just wrapping around, back to the top of the menu. If you expect to just turn on your TV, and expect to just get TV, and all of your stations, this piece of garbage is not going to allow that to happen. You can literally never turn on your TV and get normal TV. The best you can do is turn on the TV and get to the RECENT menu, and that will only give you the last three channels you were on. I downloaded the app for my phone, and it's just as bad. Don't waste your time with the app. Again, this is not a TV for normal TV viewing. This is all about streaming and advertising. There is a TV in there, but it's buried, and it will not show up on any menu , until you scan the TV for new stations, then it will add an Antenna menu . However, right out of the box there is no option to watch TV as the default. I'm still trying to figure out how somebody could design a menu so badly. Oh, also if you like to flip between TV stations back and forth, forget it. If you want to flip back and forth between stations, it's not going to happen. I'm seriously thinking about returning this piece of garbage simply because the menu is designed so poorly. IS IT REALLY SO MUCH TO ASK , THAT IF I TURN A TV OFF, WHEN I TURN IT BACK ON IT'S ON THE SAME STATION ? IS THAT REALLY TOO MUCH TO ASK , THAT MY TV STARTS UP WHERE I LET LEFT IT WHEN I TURNED IT OFF? Every TV in the history of mankind, would normally turn on at the same place. You left it when you turned it off . Not this one !!! If you are looking for a TV ... This is definitely NOT the answer. Again, this is verified information provided to me by Vizio technical support. Looks like this one's going back in the box. Shameful. Over something so simple as turning a TV on and off, that doesn't exist anymore. Wow!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am so OBSESSED
reviews.reviewText: My initial purchase of this tv was during prime day and unfortunately when it arrived the the LCD was damaged, obviously this wasn’t ideal and I was pretty annoyed. I called amazon to get a replacement and they were able to help me with the replacement and getting the damaged tv sent back to them at no additional cost. The replacement just arrived today and I couldn’t possibly be more impressed with the video quality and the range of sound. The colors are so vibrant and the HD is amazing. My phone camera isn’t doing the picture quality justice, I promise. I honestly couldn’t be happier with my purchase or the customer service I received from Amazon. Not to mention how great the price is. 10/10 would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Do not buy this TV if you live outside of the US or Canada. I could never buy another Vizio brand. The SmartCast and watch free doesn't work outside of those regions. Total waste of money..
